info:
Polls Assembly Instance 100 Attribute 3 every 250 ms and writes to InfluxDB.
Usage: Import into Node-RED and configure CIP connection/Influx credentials before enabling.
Depends on node-red-contrib-cip-ethernet-ip and node-red-contrib-influxdb nodes.

name: PM500 assembly read to InfluxDB
info: Triggers a CIP poll every 250 ms, translates the binary payload into watts, and writes to InfluxDB measurement `pm500_assembly`. Ensure the InfluxDB node is configured with authentication tokens produced by docker-compose stack.

name: Prepare CIP read
info: Constructs the message envelope expected by node-red-contrib-cip-ethernet-ip for a single attribute read.

name: Assembly 100 Attr 3
info: Executes the CIP read using a configured connection resource; requires node-red-contrib-cip-ethernet-ip with credentials for the PM500 device.

name: Format for Influx
info: Parses the binary response buffer and shapes the payload for the InfluxDB write node using measurement `pm500_assembly`.
